Text: ISDA between Niagara Mohawk Energy Marketing Inc and Enron Power Marketing Inc Cc Marie per our conversation yesterday afternoon attached are proposed drafts of the Schedule and the Para relative to the above Having spoken with Dennis Goldmann I am advised that there are currently Guaranties in place in the sum of M each one by Niagara Mohawk Holdings Inc fbo Enron and one by Enron Inc fbo Niagara Mohawk Energy Marketing I am told that our respective credit departments want to raise the credit lines to M for each party but to effect that we will have to modify the existing Guaranties accordingly Let me know if this is your understanding as well After you have had the chance to review the attached please send me a markedup draft and we can discuss our concerns from there Should you have any questions feel free to call me I can be reached at Any credit concerns can be discussed with Dennis Goldmann who can be reached at I look forward to hearing from you Patty Snyder See attached file ENRON SCHEDULEnmemdrftdocSee attached file ENRON Paranmemdrftdoc ENRON SCHEDULEnmemdrftdoc ENRON Paranmemdrftdoc

proposed ISDAMarie per our conversation last week attached are the proposed Schedule and Credit Annex Paragraph for your review Please call me after you have had the chance to take a look at it I can be reached at Patty Snyder See attached file ENRON ParanmemdrftdocSee attached file ENRON SCHEDULEnmemdrftdoc ENRON Paranmemdrftdoc ENRON SCHEDULEnmemdrftdoc
